notes: all new ACTIVE entries should use the New Years Eve 2099 Sunset
all new PENDING entries should use New Year's Eve 1999 Sunset
'sunsetZulu' means the ISO Date-Time String without any TimeZone offset, commonly called 'Zulu Time'
_DO_ use actual SunSet Zulu Stamps when deactivating a Form
you _CAN_ future-date the SunSet, but you had better be _CERTAIN_, otherwise use New Years Eve 2099
_DO_ use just before Midnight (...T23:59:59.599Z) if you future-date the SunSet, unless it needs to be more precise(¿why?)
making 'id' a String is following how it is returned by FormStack API, but code will use either/both
of course, we can cull sun-setted Forms, but NO RUSH, ¿maybe 1 year after sunset?
